Package metrics.perclass

Interface SingleScore

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAuxiliaryScores, F1PerClass, FNPerClass, FPPerClass, SensitivityPerClass, SpecificityPerClass, TNPerClass, TPPerClass
public interface SingleScore
This is an interface for a singleScore. That is, given an index of a class, get the score for that particular class.
Since:
2020-05-03
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
AbstractAuxiliaryScores, FNPerClass, FPPerClass, TNPerClass, TPPerClass, SensitivityPerClass, SpecificityPerClass, F1PerClass

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double getScore​(int i)
    A method that when given the index of a class should return a double with the corresponding score for that class

  • Method Details

    • getScore

      double getScore​(int i)
      A method that when given the index of a class should return a double with the corresponding score for that class
      Parameters:
      i - An int with the index of the class
      Returns:
      A double with a score
